markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Mutagenic Flashback](/Actions.aspx?ID=340) <actions string="Free Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 73 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency** once per day

</column>

---

You experience a brief resurgence of a [mutagen](/Traits.aspx?ID=116). Choose one mutagen you’ve consumed since your last daily preparations. You gain the effects of that mutagen for 1 minute.
name: Mutagenic Flashback
